info.label: Senior Software Engineer
info.brief: A brief description of yourself as a candidate that appears in some résumé themes. You may use **Markdown** and/or HTML formatting here including [links](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Random) or stick to plain text.

history.summary: A summary of your role in this position. Can include **Markdown** and inline HTML formatting.
highlights: Increased profits on left-handed spin widgets by 35%.
Promoted to Head Ninja after 500 successful cage matches.

history.summary: A summary of your previous role. Can include **Markdown** and inline HTML formatting.

projects.title: Awesome Project #1
projects.summary: Show off your project work with a Markdown-and-HTML friendly summary of your role on the project. Software projects, creative projects, business projects can all appear here.
projects.description: A description of the project, for audiences that may not be familiar with it. Like the summary section, can include **Markdown** and inline HTML formatting.

projects.title: Asteroids
projects.summary: Conceived, designed, implemented, and created 3D Asteroids space shooter with Unreal Engine IV and C++.
projects.description: A 3D Asteroids clone with Unreal 4 and cross-platform C++.

education.summary: Optional overall education summary. Not used in most themes.

history.title: BSCS
history.summary: Graduate of Acme University, summer of 2009. Go [Coyotes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coyote)!
